pageDescription:
Our project is designed to provide an intuitive and efficient solution for managing and organizing tasks seamlessly. With a user-friendly interface, it enables users to create, edit, and track their progress effortlessly. The system integrates advanced features such as real-time collaboration, automated notifications, and insightful analytics to enhance productivity. 
Built using modern technologies, the project ensures scalability, security, and optimal performance. Whether you are an individual looking for a personal task manager or a team in need of a collaborative workspace, our platform adapts to your needs. 
Experience a smarter way to stay organized and achieve your goals efficiently. Let me know if you'd like any modifications or additional details!

projects.name: LocalBrandShop_BE
projects.description: Backend for Local Brand Shop application.
projects.installation:
- Clone the repository
```bash
git clone https://github.com/DoThanhLong15/LocalBrandShop_BE.git
```
 - Navigate to the project directory
```bash
cd LocalBrandShop_BE
```
 - Install dependencies
```bash
npm install
```
 - Set up environment variables as per the .env.example file
 - Start the server
```bash
npm start
```

projects.name: SpringOnlineCourseApp
projects.description: A Spring-based application for managing online courses.
projects.installation:
- Clone the repository: 
```bash
git clone https://github.com/DoThanhLong15/SpringOnlineCourseApp.git
```
- Navigate to the project directory: 
```bash
cd SpringOnlineCourseApp
```
- Set up the MySQL database and update the application.properties file accordingly
- Build the project: 
```bash
mvn clean install
```
- Run the application: 
```bash
java -jar target/SpringOnlineCourseApp.jar
```

projects.name: portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase projects and skills.
projects.installation:
- Clone the repository: 
```bash
git clone https://github.com/DoThanhLong15/portfolio.git
```
- Navigate to the project directory: 
```bash
cd portfolio
```
- Install dependencies: 
```bash
npm install
```
- Start the development server: 
```bash
npm start
```
